comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: She was the former showgirl Charlotte Katherine Palmer. In 1916, she was divorced from her husband James Cresson Parrish jr., a lawyer and famous amateur golf champion, see The evening world., March 01, 1916, Final Edition, Image 1, with photo Bismarck daily tribune., May 26, 1915, Image 1, with photo The Washington Post, 22 November 1910, Page 11 Her husbands father, James Cresson Parrish Sr., was the second husband of Emily Thorn, whose mother, Emily Vanderbilt Thorn, was the forth child of commodore Vanderbilt (The sun., June 18, 1915, Page 14, col. 2, "MRS. J. C. PARRISH, JR., IS SUED BY MODISTES")

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks B-59 for providing her name and her (ex) husband's full name. We will update our catalog record.
